title: Da Xiang Lin Wang Zhi Yi Pao Chengming
synopsis: Lin Wang (voiced by Song Xiaoyu) is a lively and cute baby elephant living happily in the jungle on the border between Yunnan and Myanmar. Lin Wang's good friend is a Chinese boy named Wang Zai (voiced by Li Yao). The friendship between one person and one elephant is very deep. Lin Wang, who likes to be naughty and mischievous, often causes a lot of trouble and jokes, but it is still loved by animals. The good times didn’t last long. The war started. The Japanese’s iron hooves broke through the tranquility of the jungle. Both Lin Wang and Wang’s cubs were captured by the Japanese and became coolies. In the army, Lin Wang knew many people from different places who had the same The elephants who suffered tragically, they decided to join forces to fight back. The arrival of the Chinese Expeditionary Army ended the miserable lives of Lin Wang and Wang's cubs. Lin Wang joined the army as a war elephant.(translated from douban)
